meanings.sent3: It would be funny if a dance-off occurred during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: A brilliant idea occurred to me while I was in the shower.
meanings.sent5: The solar eclipse occurring next month will be a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: To be found or met with
meanings.sent1: Lost items often occur in the last place you look.
meanings.sent3: It's strange how coincidences occur when you least expect them.
meanings.sent4: A sense of calm occurred when she finally found her keys.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower occurs only in tropical rainforests.

meanings.sent1: The answer occurred to me suddenly.
meanings.sent2: Ideas occur more easily when you're relaxed.
meanings.sent3: It would be odd if the solution occurred in a dream.
meanings.sent4: A brilliant plan occurred to her while she was jogging.
meanings.sent5: The perfect gift idea occurred to him while browsing the store.
